recipes.label: Temptations?
recipes.startdescription: There are colours in the world, there are colours in the Mansus, and then there are colours lost. Their absence is the knife I cannot release. [The Remembrance temptation has its teeth in you, and no other Temptation will touch you.]

recipes.label: Vitality
recipes.startdescription: This provokes no dreams; but I could Study it to increase my Health.
recipes.comments: Not currently possible with restrictions on Dream primary slot

recipes.label: Erudition
recipes.startdescription: This provokes no dreams; but I could Study it to increase my Reason.
recipes.comments: Not currently possible with restrictions on Dream primary slot

recipes.label: Glimmering
recipes.startdescription: This provokes no dreams, just now; but I could Study it to increase my Passion.
recipes.comments: Not currently possible with restrictions on Dream primary slot

recipes.label: Contentment
recipes.startdescription: Contentment isn't a key to dreams, though dreams may sometimes make me content.
recipes.comments: Not currently possible with restrictions on Dream primary slot

recipes.label: The Next Step
recipes.startdescription: I've gone as far as I can in dream. I must perform the Work.

recipes.label: The Next Step
recipes.startdescription: I've gone as far as I can in dream. I must perform the Work.

recipes.label: Seek Composure?
recipes.startdescription: The doors of vision swing wide. A little darkness will mellow my light. Even Dread has its uses.

recipes.label: Clear my Mind?
recipes.startdescription: I remember that I was different: but I can't yet remember how. [Dread can be quelled with the correct resource.]

recipes.label: Recover?
recipes.startdescription: Resting will restore me - if I have the necessary resources.
